abstract: The U.K. is banning sexually explicit outdoor ads within 100 meters of a school. How I wish it could happen here.
snippet: The U.K. is banning sexually explicit outdoor ads within 100 meters of a school. How I wish it could happen here.
lead_paragraph: It will never happen here, but oh, how I wish it would. Over at The Gloss, Jessica Pauline Ogilvie reports that Britain  is banning outdoor "overtly sexual ads" within 100 meters of a school, and "ridiculously sexual, over-the-top, basically porn" ads won't be allowed on billboards at all.
